name: Friendle
description:
Make new friends!

In Friendle you get to choose your friends to create the ultimate friendgroup in a Tinder-like way.

Each character will present themselves to you and based on the topics they like/dislike it's up to you to decide if they fit your fantastic friendgroup!

[CONTROLS]

Left Mouse Button.
(Hover with your mouse over the side you'd like to pick (Yes/No) and click. That's all!

Made for the GMTK 2021 Gamejam
